title: Concept for new sword of the occult
body:
I just came up with this idea on the spot so its probably broken and overpowered but here it is


Soul Reaver (Cheesy name i know)

2800 gold 

build path is 

Bf sword                  Serrated Dirk

then a 400 gold thing at the end

Gives base 75 ad 

Unique Passive: Every (3-5, i don't know which one is better) kills grants a stack giving you 10 ad permanently unless the item is sold.

Unique Passive: 15 Lethality

Unique Passive: 20 Movespeed out of combat


Probably not the greatest idea but i thought i might as well write it down.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: i dont think a stacking item should be expensive imo, the reason (i assume) why it was removed in the first place is because a fed top laner with fully stacked occult just doesnt have the weaknesses that a mid laner suffers from with mejais, simply ap champs can get shutdown fairly easily but a renekton with stacks is impossible to beat
